tagline: A React Web App for Creating and Sharing Drum Loops.
desc: A React Web App for Creating and Sharing Drum Loops.

__**Features:**__ 
:small_orange_diamond: Create Drum Loops 
:small_orange_diamond: Record Custom Sounds 
:small_orange_diamond: Save and Share Drum Loops With Others
__**Front End Tech:**__ small_blue_diamond: [React](https://reactjs.org/) - JavaScript UI Library
__**Back End Tech:**__ small_blue_diamond: [Express](https://expressjs.com/) - Web Framework for Node.js

tasks.title: Trello Tasks
tasks.desc: We use Trello to manage the tasks within this project, [here](https://trello.com/drumroot) is your invitation. Further information on how to use Trello and claim a task can be found in the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/zero-to-mastery/drum-root/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) file on Github.
